C

CompositeIterator<F,S> - Class in org.fluentjava.iterators
Iterator that takes two Iterators, Iterables, or Arrays (not necesserily both of the same type), and iterates through both, preserving the order.
CompositeIterator(Iterator<F>, Iterator<S>) - Constructor for class org.fluentjava.iterators.CompositeIterator
 
CountingIterator<T> - Class in org.fluentjava.iterators
Extended Iterator Adapter that counts how many times next was invoked, mainly used to count the number of the iteration.

CountingIterator(Iterator<T>) - Constructor for class org.fluentjava.iterators.CountingIterator
